text: "Lovers and Friends" is a song by American hip hop group Lil Jon & The East Side Boyz. It was released in November 2004. It was released as the last single from their album Crunk Juice. It features Usher and Ludacris. The song reached number three on the Hot 100 chart. "Lovers & Friends" was a sample of Michael Sterling's song. ==Chart positions== Chart (2004â€“05) Peak position ==References== Category:2004 songs Category:R&B; songs Category:Usher songs
title: Lovers & Friends
